name: 2017 YouTube Dark
description:
Yet another YouTube Dark theme. The new layout broke a lot of the old user styles, and since no one appeared to update them, I wrote my own.

Feedback appreciated

2017-10-13:
Just noticed youtube has a built-in dark theme! Just click your account icon and the dropdown menu should a "Dark theme: on/off" entry
additional_info:
0.1 - Only watch page has been thoroughly updated
0.2 - Majorly improve subscriptions and search page. TODO: playlist page
0.3 - Fix colors on `/watch` page's playlist sidebar
